TopicTitle: A Simple Request - Part Actuation Settable by action group

Articles.Content:
This is mainly for shuttles, but can have tons of uses else where. 

Right now, you have to set pitch, roll and yaw all by hand. There's no way to do it with action group, at least none I can find. 

So Squad, could you please add part actuation settable by action group?
So much this. I just want to be able to set a specific hinge to its min or max value.
Bump. Add that it should be settable by KAL-9000 too.
